Palettes & Hues ðŸŽ¨ is a powerful Chrome extension that instantly extracts the dominant color palette from the visible area of any webpage, it's a color picker for the most dominant colors on the page, Here's why it's a must-have tool for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts:

1. Instant Color Extraction: With a single click, capture the dominant colors with their HEX code and names, use color picker tool to create custom palette from visible area of any website you're viewing.

2. Real-Time Design Inspiration: Discover inspiring color combinations as you browse the web. Perfect for kickstarting your next design project or overcoming creative blocks.

3. Effortless Color Copying: Easily copy HEX codes with one click, streamlining your workflow and ensuring color accuracy in your projects.

4. Maintain Palette History: Easily load the previously captured palette with one click & copy Hex code from history.

5. Extract Colors from Image: Easily upload images and extract dominant colors or create a custom palette by picking colors from the image.

6. Export Color Palette: Easily export the captured palette with one click in multiple formats like JPG, PNG, CSV, JSON, CP (Color Palette)

7. Context-Aware Analysis: By focusing on the visible area, you get relevant color schemes based on what you're actually seeing, not hidden page elements.

8. Time-Saving Tool: Quickly analyze color schemes of competitor websites, study brand colors, or gather inspiration without leaving your browser.

9. User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design makes color extraction and analysis a breeze, even for non-technical users.

10. Privacy-Focused: Works locally in your browser without sending data to external servers, ensuring your browsing remains private.

11. Random Color Generation: Get a random generated to quickly get your color inspiration.

Whether you're a professional designer looking to streamline your workflow, a developer aiming for pixel-perfect color matching, or simply a color enthusiast exploring the web's palette, Palettes & Hues ðŸŽ¨ is your go-to tool for instant color insights and inspiration.
